name: Yvonne Van What
profile:
3 new synthesia piano tutorials/covers every week! I've done a lot of them already, from Doctor Who and Marvel themes to Random Encounters music and FNAF. Yes, I'm doing the video game stuff too (Detroit Become Human, Baldi's Basics, Spider-Man - you name it!)
Feel free to suggest what kind of videos I should make next! 
I already made over 200 tutorials!
THIS CHANNEL IS NOT FOR KIDS OF AGE 13 AND UNDER

I also have a second channel ("Yvonne Van Why" - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCboa8FGAGseIG7XDvKhLbRg) where I'm planning to post edited version of my gaming livestreams (and some other stuff).

My software:
Finale 2014 (to create a sheet music, wma and MIDI file)
Synthesia (to play this MIDI file on screen)
Fraps or Bandicam (to record Synthesia)
Sony Vegas (to edit the video with original wma file)
Gimp (to make a thumbnail)
